short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks desired HTML contents (script, style, image, object, media)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HTML Content Blocker provides a user-friendly interface to quickly block various HTML contents  (Script, Style, Image, Object, and Media) on any webpage.

To work with this addon, please open the toolbar popup and press the desired content button (at the top) to block, then reload the tab. This extension has two modes to operate. The first and default mode is Global. In this mode, the addon is active for all domains except those listed in the allow-list table. The other mode is per-domain, where the addon is active only for the domains in the block-list table. To switch modes, please press the toggle button at the bottom-left corner of the interface. To add domains to the allowlist or blocklist table, please navigate to a website, then press the plus (+) button at the bottom footer. Likewise, to remove the domain from the table, press the minus (-) button. Badge icon text shows the number of blocked items for the active tab.

To report bugs, please visit the addon's homepage and fill out the bug report form (https://mybrowseraddon.com/html-content-blocker.html).
